data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Amaro, Renata C., Nunes, Ivan, Canedo, Clarissa, Napoli, Marcelo F., Juncá, Flora A., Verdade, Vanessa K., Haddad, Célio F. B., Rodrigues, Miguel T. (2013): A molecular phylogeny recovers Strabomantis aramunha Cassimiro, Verdade and Rodrigues, 2008 and Haddadus binotatus (Spix, 1824) (Anura: Terrarana) as sister taxa. Zootaxa 3741 (4): 569-582, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3741.4.7
